org.hps.recon.tracking

Class TrackerReconDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.TrackerReconDriver

  • public final class TrackerReconDriver
extends Driver
    This class runs the Track Reconstruction for the HPS Test Proposal detector. The tracker digitization must be run in front of it. It is intended to work with the TrackerDigiDriver digitization Driver.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.lcsim.util.Driver
